body: I can’t believe this manga came out like 3 years Ago, now that the anime has come out I see the true power of getsuyo no tawawa nsfw. Thank you illustrators for putting in time to draw these. Y’all deserve a raise
Damnit I literally cried after that chapter, the feel get to me and now I can't fap
the "hidden" chapter of maegami-chan and her sensei <(")
